title: How to make it in America, CRISP brand font
content:
Hi,

I'm looking for the fonts of the image attached, so both the 'Crisp' and the 'nyc'. I do think that the 'Crisp' is customized, but any similar font would be very helpful.

Thanks in advance!

Font: 

 Metroscript 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114716/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [crisp.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114716/http:/typophile.com/files/crisp_0.jpg) | 88.26 KB |
author: Afhaalchinees

comments.content:
"Crisp" is **[MetroScript](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114716/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alphabetsoup/metroscript/)** by Michael Doret (Alphabet Soup, 2006)  
"NYC" is too small for me
